Made in Japan Measures 4" long Made of plastic (PVC)

erasers.title: Ultra Clean Black Eraser
erasers.description: This new eraser from KUM is a real gem. It's incredibly clean and erases virtually all graphite marks. It's firm enough that you can eraser aggressively without breakable but soft enough that it won't damage delicate paper. Measures 1 1/2" x 3/8" x 1"

erasers.title: Sumo Plastic Eraser - Small
erasers.description: This eraser is one of the highest-tech examples on the market, combining the technology of Sakura's famous Foam eraser with a firmer "hybrid-matrix formula", the result is a gentle but firm eraser that works well with all hardnesses of pencils, especially those in the range of B-2H. The open-cell foam works like a super fine sandpaper on the surface of your paper, getting everything out of the microscopic nooks and crannies. Made in Japan Measures Made of plastic

erasers.title: Matomaru Kun Stick Eraser
erasers.description: The Matomaru-Kun is one of Japan's most common erasers and for good reason. It's plastic, but not as firm as the ones you're probably used to. Its slight crumbly-ness makes it perfect for even delicate paper and prevents smearing. This is a convenient stick version of the beloved Matomaru-Kun--great for tidy, precision erasing. Made in Japan Made of PVC

erasers.title: ECO Non-PVC Eraser
erasers.description: Hinodewashi makes some of the best erasers out there (including our beloved Matomaru-Kun) and this is their non-pvc Eco eraser. It's firm, safe and effective, perfect for big graphite messes. Made in Japan Measures 1 1/2" x 1/2" x 1/2" Made on Non-PVC plastic

erasers.title: Kneadable Eraser
erasers.description: For delicate erasing or use with smudgy materials, these kneadable erasers are soft and moldable and come in an airtight plastic case. The eraser itself is colored, but don't worry--it won't leave a trace of colored residue. Made in Malaysia Measures 1 3/4" x 1 3/4" x 1/2" Sold in a plastic storage case

erasers.title: Arrowhead Rubber Eraser Cap 2
erasers.description: The Arrowhead is the most classic and best known pink eraser cap out there. It's durable, long-lasting and is double-walled so it won't split up the side when used heavily. Made in China Fits any normal diameter pencil Made of synthetic rubber Sold individually

erasers.title: Hi-Polymer Eraser Cap 2
erasers.description: Considered to be superior to any other eraser cap, these ones are made of the same eraser formula as the well-known Pencil Hi-Polymer. Made in China Fits any normal diameter pencil Made of synthetic rubber Sold individually

erasers.title: L & C Hardtmuth Rubber Eraser - Large 2
erasers.description: Though they're not called L & C Hardtmuth anymore, Koh-i-Noor has retained the design and branding of their most classic eraser for over a century. It's made of natural rubber and pumice as erasers originally were and is a great multi-purpose option. Made in the Czech Republic Measures 2" x 1 1/8" x 1/2" Made of natural rubber

erasers.title: L & C Hardtmuth Rubber Eraser - Small 2
erasers.description: Though they're not called L & C Hardtmuth anymore, Koh-i-Noor has retained the design and branding of their most classic eraser for over a century. It's made of natural rubber and pumice as erasers originally were and is a great multi-purpose option. Made in the Czech Republic Measures 1 3/8" x 7/8" x 1/4" Made of natural rubber

erasers.title: Magic Rubber Eraser 2
erasers.description: Eraser technology may be rather advanced these days, but sometimes you just can't beat an old-fashioned natural rubber eraser. This one will work well with graphite of all types but is also gritty enough to handle colored pencil. *Color combinations vary Made in the Czech Republic Measures 1 1/2" x 3/4" x 3/8" Made of natural rubber

erasers.title: Mono Sand Eraser 2
erasers.description: Gritty, rubber erasers were historically made to erase ink, but this particular eraser is our favorite choice for colored pencils, or any hard-to-erase mark for that matter. The silica grit removes the top layer of the paper as the friction and heat of rubbing attracts the color, ink or graphite. If this eraser can't eraser it, nothing can. Just be careful to use it gently and to avoid use on fragile paper. Made in Japan Measures 2" x 3/4" x 2/3" Made of natural latex and silica grit

erasers.title: No. 014 Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: A minimalist, hard-working eraser. It's sure to look great on your desk. If you're familiar with the iconic Pentel Hi-Polymer, you'll love this one because it's the same, just in more stylish packaging. Made by Pentel for Craft Design Technology in Japan Measure 2 1/2" x 1" x 1/2"

erasers.title: Pebble Rubber Erasers - 9 pack 2
erasers.description: These little guys are easy to slip into a pocket or pencil case and are made of a medium grit natural rubber for any type of erasing situation. They're made from the off-cuts of other Koh-i-Noor erasers so they vary in color and pattern. Made in the Czech Republic Sold in a pack of 9 Made of natural rubber

erasers.title: Slendy Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: Super slim with a sturdy metal body, the Slendy Eraser is a perfectionist's new best friend. The tiny tip allows you to erase extra precisely and retracts neatly into the body when you're done. It's also remarkably slim, perfect for tucking in a pencil case or notebook. Muss and fuss gone. Made in Japan Measures 4 inches long Sold individually (replacement erasers sold as a pack of 2)

erasers.title: Small Pink "All Art" Eraser 2
erasers.description: Erases graphite and is meant for general office and school use. Measures 1 x 3/4 x 3/8 inches

erasers.title: Super Gold High Class Rubber Eraser 2
erasers.description: What this eraser lacks in high-tech erasing power it makes up for in design. The Seed Super Gold sits in a little metal eraser holder and comes in a tiny eraser sized box. Don't worry--it does erase well, though we have a feeling you'll be too amused by its appearance to put it to paper. Made in Japan Measures 2" x 3/4" x 1/2" Made of natural rubber

erasers.title: Technik Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: This lovely example of a plastic eraser is also our bestseller, and for good reason. It's firm and minimally messy and can pick up even your toughest graphite messes. You'll find that it wears away slowly, so you won't need to replace it anytime soon. Made in Switzerland Measures 2 1/2" x 1" x 1/2" Made of phthalate-free plastic

erasers.title: Thermoplastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: You'll want to play with these as much as you want to eraser with them. The hexagonal shape allows super sharp edges for super fine erasing. They might be brightly colored, but they won't leave a trace on your page. Made in the Czech Republic Measures 1 1/2" diameter Made of synthetic rubber

erasers.title: L & C Hardtmuth Rubber Eraser - Tiny 2
erasers.description: Though they're not called L & C Hardtmuth anymore, Koh-i-Noor has retained the design and branding of their most classic eraser for over a century. It's made of natural rubber and pumice as erasers originally were and is a great multi-purpose option. Made in the Czech Republic Measures 1" x 3/4" x 1/4" inch Made of natural rubber

erasers.title: White School Rubber Eraser 2
erasers.description: Truth be told, what makes this eraser great is not only its erasing power but also the fact that it's printed with Caran d'Ache's original logo. As an eraser, you'll find that it's of fine quality. It's a little bit more firm than most modern synthetic rubber erasers but not as gritty as a natural rubber eraser. Made in Switzerland Measures 1 1/4" x 1" x 1/4" Made of phthalate-free synthetic rubber Sold individually

erasers.title: Perfection Eraser Pencil with Brush 2
erasers.description: Once upon a time erasers like this were used with typewriters to erase mistakes and then to promptly brush away the shaving so as to keep the typewriter clean. These days only a few examples are still manufactured, including this fine example from Faber-Castell. Made in Germany Core: a rubbery, minimally gritty synthetic eraser Measures 8 1/4 inches long Sold individually Round barrel, normal diameter Pre-sharpened

erasers.title: 430 Synthetic Rubber Eraser 2
erasers.description: This cute little square is a high quality eraser that is good for just about anything. Unlike natural rubber, this synthetic rubber eraser won't dry out. Made in Spain Measures 1 1/2" x 1 1/2" x 1/2" Made of synthetic rubber

erasers.title: Nata 624 Synthetic Rubber Eraser 2
erasers.description: Milan's best-selling eraser, the Nata is made of a premium synthetic rubber and comes with has a plastic sleeve to keep it nice and clean. Made in Spain Measure 1 1/2" x 1" Made of synthetic rubber

erasers.title: Matomaru-Kun Gold Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: The Matomaru-Kun is one of Japan's most common erasers and for good reason. It's plastic, but not as firm as the ones you're probably used to. Its slight crumbly-ness makes it perfect for even delicate paper and prevents smearing. Made in Japan Measures 1 3/4 x 1/2 x 1" Made of PVC

erasers.title: Non-PVC X-122 Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: Safe, effective and ergonomically designed, this eraser is firm enough for difficult marks but gentle enough for fragile paper situations. It's a little messier than most plastic erasers but not as much as many rubber erasers. It comes from Läufer, one of Germany's oldest and most recognizable names in erasers. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" x 1/2" x 3/4" Made of PVC-free plastic

erasers.title: Matomaru-Kun Long Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: The Matomaru-Kun is one of Japan's most common erasers and for good reason. It's plastic, but not as firm as the ones you're probably used to. Its slight crumbly-ness makes it perfect for even delicate paper and prevents smearing. We especially love this one for its unique, long, square shape. Made in Japan Measures 3 1/2 x 1/2 x 1/2" Made of PVC

erasers.title: Plast-Combi Plastic/Rubber Eraser 2
erasers.description: Combination erasers are important if you work in multiple mediums but this one's unique because it's a plastic combination eraser. 2/3 is a medium firmness, standard eraser for graphite and 1/3 is an extra firm, very gritty eraser for harder-to-erase situations. The sleeve specifically suggests use on 7B-9H pencils, colored and copier inks. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" x 3/4" x 1/2" Made of plastic

erasers.title: Mono "Erase Easily" Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: The Mono eraser was first introduced by Tombow in 1969, taking its name from the company's prized Mono range of pencils. Tombow's erasers have a reputation for being some of the highest quality, hardest working plastic erasers on the market. This specimen is as great as the original, it's just a tiny bit more crumbly for slightly gentler erasing. Made in Japan Measures 1 1/2" x 1/2" x 1/2" Made of plastic (PVC)

erasers.title: CWPE Black Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: This soft eraser is crumbly and flexible, making it extra-gentle on your paper. Don't be fooled by the black plastic--it smooths away graphite without leaving a mark. And it's got a CWPE pencil printed on it. Viking pencil company is a really special find--it was founded in 1914 by a matchstick company and after changing hands for a few decades have recently re-emerged. Made in the E.U. Measures 2 3/4 inches x 3/4 inch

erasers.title: Mono Smart Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: The Mono eraser was first introduced by Tombow in 1969, taking its name from the company's prized Mono range of pencils. Tombow's erasers have a reputation for being some of the highest quality, hardest working plastic erasers on the market. This incarnation of it is about the size of a stick of gum and is excellent for precision erasing or for keeping in your pencil case with minimal bulk. Made in Japan Measures 2 5/8" x1/4" x 1/4" Made of plastic (PVC)

erasers.title: Mono Plastic Eraser - Black 2
erasers.description: The Mono eraser was first introduced by Tombow in 1969, taking its name from the company's prized Mono range of pencils. Tombow's erasers have a reputation for being some of the highest quality, hardest working plastic erasers on the market. As a slick, black version of the classic Tombow Mono eraser, you'll find this guy to do the job just as well as your favorite Mono or any other premium plastic eraser. The only difference is the color, which we can assure you won't stain your page. Made in Japan Measures 1 3/4" x 1/2" x 1/2" Made of plastic (PVC)

erasers.title: Gum Eraser 2
erasers.description: This product reminds us so much of a caramel square that we sometimes swear it smells like one. It is, however, made out of gum rubber, and crumbles as it gently lifts the graphite off your paper. Family-owned General Pencil Company has been making pencils in Jersey City, NJ since 1889 and is one of only three pencil companies still left in the United States. Made in the USA Measures 1" x 3/4" x 1" Made of rubber

erasers.title: Doppel-Läufer Universal 0440 Rubber Eraser 2
erasers.description: Made by one of Germany's oldest and finest eraser companies, the 0440 eraser is as traditional and nostalgic as they come. The red side is soft and meant to erase graphite, while the blue side is a little grittier, allowing it to eraser ink and colored pencil more easily. Made in Germany Measures 2" x 1/2" x 5/16" Made of natural rubber

erasers.title: L-125 Plastic Eraser 2
erasers.description: Läufer makes some of Germany's finest erasers, including this one, which is extra firm, impossibly tidy and held inside a sturdy plastic sleeve. This thing can erase just about anything, though be careful on fragile paper--it really is a very firm eraser. Made in Germany Measures 2" x 1" x 1/2" Made of plastic

erasers.title: Mono Zero Eraser 2
erasers.description: The Mono eraser was first introduced by Tombow in 1969, taking its name from the company's prized Mono range of pencils. Tombow's erasers have a reputation for being some of the highest quality, hardest working plastic erasers on the market. This clicky version is made for high-precision erasing with its very slim, replaceable eraser stick (2.3mm to be exact!)! You can find the replacement erasers here. Made in Japan Measures 4" long Made of plastic (PVC)

erasers.title: Ultra Clean Black Eraser 2
erasers.description: This new eraser from KUM is a real gem. It's incredibly clean and erases virtually all graphite marks. It's firm enough that you can eraser aggressively without breakable but soft enough that it won't damage delicate paper. Measures 1 1/2" x 3/8" x 1"

erasers.title: Sumo Plastic Eraser - Small 2
erasers.description: This eraser is one of the highest-tech examples on the market, combining the technology of Sakura's famous Foam eraser with a firmer "hybrid-matrix formula", the result is a gentle but firm eraser that works well with all hardnesses of pencils, especially those in the range of B-2H. The open-cell foam works like a super fine sandpaper on the surface of your paper, getting everything out of the microscopic nooks and crannies. Made in Japan Measures Made of plastic

erasers.title: Matomaru Kun Stick Eraser 2
erasers.description: The Matomaru-Kun is one of Japan's most common erasers and for good reason. It's plastic, but not as firm as the ones you're probably used to. Its slight crumbly-ness makes it perfect for even delicate paper and prevents smearing. This is a convenient stick version of the beloved Matomaru-Kun--great for tidy, precision erasing. Made in Japan Made of PVC

erasers.title: ECO Non-PVC Eraser 2
erasers.description: Hinodewashi makes some of the best erasers out there (including our beloved Matomaru-Kun) and this is their non-pvc Eco eraser. It's firm, safe and effective, perfect for big graphite messes. Made in Japan Measures 1 1/2" x 1/2" x 1/2" Made on Non-PVC plastic

erasers.title: Kneadable Eraser 2
erasers.description: For delicate erasing or use with smudgy materials, these kneadable erasers are soft and moldable and come in an airtight plastic case. The eraser itself is colored, but don't worry--it won't leave a trace of colored residue. Made in Malaysia Measures 1 3/4" x 1 3/4" x 1/2" Sold in a plastic storage case

sharpeners.title: Castor Brass Long Point Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Sister sharpener to the Pollux, the Castor in a single-blade long point sharpener. It's made out of solid brass and does a point comparable two-step long point sharpeners but with greater ease. Replacement blades are available for the Castor here. Made in Germany *Point comparison: Top - M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom - M+R Castor Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Pollux Brass Concave Sharpener
sharpeners.description: As the rarest type of single-hole sharpener, this is one that we've been patiently anticipating the arrival of since early 2015 when it was first introduced. It's made of solid brass and has a blade that carves the pencil to a concave point that's longer than usual. It's convenient and elegant--a win-win in our book. For those on the hunt for a coveted antique A.W Faber Janus sharpener for its similarly concave capabilities, this is a comparable alternative. *Replacement blades for the Pollux are available here. Made in Germany Single-hole, can accommodate normal diameter pencils. *Though this sharpener sharpens beautifully, it only works perfectly on high-quality pencils with well-centered cores. We do not recommend using this sharpener as your everyday go-to as some pencils can't withstand the curve. Should your Pollux start breaking your pencils, that is usually a sign that it's time for new blades.

sharpeners.title: T'Gaal Adjustable Sharpener
sharpeners.description: With five different length settings you can sharpener your pencil extra short--like the factory sharpened point on a golf pencil or to a proper long-point for extended writing sessions. Whatever length you prefer, you'll have all the options you'll ever need. Made in Japan

sharpeners.title: Masterpiece Long Point Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Behold: the longest point you'll ever get from a hand-held sharpener. Seriously, prepare to be amazed. The Kum Masterpiece is handmade from magnesium and has a two blade system with a removable brake situated on the end. It takes a bit of practice to get the hang of it. You use the blade on the left to sharpen the wood and the blade on the right for the graphite. You can read a very useful and detailed description of use here if you need a little help. Made in Germany Includes 2 replacement blades, a plastic case and a neoprene cover *Point Comparison - Top: Kum Magnesium Long Point Sharpener, Middle: Kum Automatic Long Point Sharpener, Bottom: Kum Masterpiece

sharpeners.title: Brass Bullet Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Every pencil collection needs this classic sharpener. It's heavy, comfortable to use and super sharp. We recommend it even for your most fragile pencils. The most important thing about effective sharpening is the blade sharpness, and though this is a hard-working sharpener the blades will need to be replaced over time. Made in Germany Single-hole, can accommodate normal diameter pencils. *Point comparison - Top: M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom: Dux Block Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Brass Bullet Sharpener with Key Ring
sharpeners.description: The Bullet Sharpener is our best-seller for its classic design and ability to sharpen any pencil to a reliable point. This version, however, is special because it has a key ring attached to it for all of your on-the-go sharpening needs (or if you just have a hard time keeping track of your sharpener). Made in Germany Single-hole, can accommodate normal diameter pencils *Point comparison - Top: M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom: Dux Block Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Brass Adjustable Sharpener with Leather Case
sharpeners.description: This sharpener is special because it harkens back to a time when it wasn't unusual to buy a pencil sharpener with an accompanying leather case. The sharpener itself is a version of the classic Dux brass block sharpener, except that it has a dial on the end which can be used to adjust the desired sharpness of the point. For precision tasks, you can get your pencil as sharp as can be but for more fragile pencils that are better off with a dull point (like colored pencils) there is no worry about over-sharpening. Made in Germany Measures 1" x 1/2" x 3/4" Includes one sharpener and one leather case along with instructions *Point comparison: From top to bottom, settings 1-3

sharpeners.title: Brass Block Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Sometimes simple is better, which usually tends to be the case when it comes to pencil sharpeners. This one is small but hard-working. It's made of solid brass and has a sharp, easy to replace blade. It sharpens to a medium point and with a sharp blade is gentle enough for even your most fragile pencils. Made in Germany Measures 1" x 1/2" x 3/4" *Point comparison - Top: M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom: Dux Block Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Brass Round Double-hole Sharpener
sharpeners.description: A weighty, perfect sharpener for all sizes of pencils (Jumbo, Mini-Jumbo, Triangular, Heart-shaped--you name it!) by the classic German sharpener brand. It sharpens pencils of all shapes and sizes to a reliable medium point. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Brass Double-hole Wedge Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Made from solid brass and in the most recognizable pencil-sharpener shape, this double-hole wedge is an extra durable sharpener for every pencil in your arsenal. It sharpens to a medium point and if kept sharp can handle even your most fragile pencils. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Aluminum Double-hole Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Think of this as the luxury version of the sharpener you kept in your Spacemaker in elementary school. It's made of solid aluminum and has a double-hole sharpener affixed inside the lid. No matter what size the pencil, this sharpener can handle it. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" in height, 1 1/2" in diameter

sharpeners.title: Duroplast Double-hole Sharpener
sharpeners.description: As one of the most nostalgic European sharpeners, this Bakelite classic has a single hole wedge sharpener affixed into the lid. The reservoir will catch all of your shavings and the sharpener blades are easily replaceable, making this a sharpener that's about much more than good looks. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" in height, 2" in diameter Double-hole. Can accommodate pencils of any size.

sharpeners.title: Duroplast Sharpener
sharpeners.description: As one of the most nostalgic European sharpeners, this Bakelite classic has a single hole wedge sharpener affixed into the lid. The reservoir will catch all of your shavings and the sharpener blades are easily replaceable, making this a sharpener that's about much more than good looks. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/4" in height, 1 1/2" in diameter Single-hole

sharpeners.title: Lefty Double-hole Sharpener - 3 Colors
sharpeners.description: A sharpener just for our left-handed friends! This little guy twists the opposite way of a right-handed sharpener. A must have for the southpaws in your life. It catches the shavings too, so you don't have to worry about a mess. Made in Germany Double-hole for both normal and jumbo diameter pencils

sharpeners.title: Automatic Long Point Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Just in case a standard point isn't your jam, the blade on the left sharpens just the wood and the blade on the right does just the graphite, resulting in a point about 4mm longer than your average single blade. It might take a little bit of practice but once you get the hand of it you'll find that a long point is ideal for extensive writing and for achieving a very fine point. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" x 1" x 1 1/4" Includes two replacement blades *Point comparison - Top: Kum Magnesium Long Point Sharpener, Middle: Kum Automatic Long Point Sharpener, Bottom: Kum Masterpiece Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Magnesium Long Point Sharpener
sharpeners.description: It's lightweight, affordable and simply very handy. This single-blade sharpener will give you a long point with out the fuss of a two-hole system. We consider this to be the starter sharpener for those looking to test out what this whole long-point thing is about. Made in Germany *Point comparison - Top: Kum Magnesium Long Point Sharpener, Middle: Kum Automatic Long Point Sharpener, Bottom: Kum Masterpiece Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Pencil Sharpening Machine
sharpeners.description: It doesn't really get any better than this sharpener. Built to last, this thing will sharpen even your most difficult pencils. The butterfly clamp can accommodate triangular, hexagonal, round, heart-shaped...basically any shape of pencil in any size. It comes with a mount for your desk and is easy to clean by simply twisting the base of the crank and dusting off the burr. Made in Switzerland

sharpeners.title: Uni Palette Sharpener
sharpeners.description: We love this sharpener because it's simple and insanely compact. It's the perfect addition to your travel kit. Made in Japan *Point comparison: top - M+R Bullet Sharpener, bottom - Palette

sharpeners.title: Pencil Peeler
sharpeners.description: Alas--the perfect tool for the hand sharpening amateur! Or just the pencil enthusiast who's looking for a new way to get a great point. This is a modern version of a type of pencil peeling knife that was common in the 1800s. The sharp end of the blade faces inward so you can hold it from the curved end and drag it across the pencil tip to sharpener as you would with a regular knife, just with a bit more control*. Bonus: the Pencil Peeler was awarded Product of the Year for writing instruments by the International Stationery Press Association in 2017! Made in Switzerland of magnesium Measures 2 1/2" x 1" x 5/16" Comes with one peeler and three replacement blades *There are visual instructions on the back of the blister pack

sharpeners.title: Uni KH-20 Hand Crank Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Mitsubishi certainly knows good pencils and this sharpener is their perfect match. It's an easy-to-use self-feeding hand crank sharpener that sharpens to a remarkably long point. Made in China *Point comparison: top - KH-20, bottom - M+R Bullet Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Premium Rotary Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Designed in Germany for maximum sharpening efficiency, this simple, hardworking sharpening machine is a standard self-feeding hand-crank that can accommodate jumbo pencils too. On the back of the crank is a red dial to adjust sharpness and the a spot to insert a clamp in case you'd like to affix it to a table. Made in China Can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Double-hole Canister Sharpener
sharpeners.description: We love this sharpener because it's simple and has a grown-up design with a pop of color (our favorite one, at that). It's the right size for a small desk or even for carrying in your bag as the lid snaps on pretty tight. Made in China Double-hole. Can accommodate pencils of any size.

sharpeners.title: Neon Plastic Double-Hole Wedge Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Simple, cute and perfect for your jumbo pencils. This sharpener uses standard tried-and-true Kum blades in a plastic sharpener body. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters.

sharpeners.title: 24-carat Gold Double Hole Sharpener
sharpeners.description: The best of the best from the world's best known sharpener company! This beauty is 24-carat gold-plated and has a canister to collect the shavings in. It's a standard double-hole sharpener with replaceable blades. To top it off, it comes in a lovely box. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters.

sharpeners.title: Matterhorn Pencil Sharpening Machine -Brut Rosé Edition
sharpeners.description: It doesn't really get any better than this sharpener. Built to last, this thing will sharpen even your most difficult pencils. The butterfly clamp can accommodate triangular, hexagonal, round, heart-shaped...basically any shape of pencil in any size. It comes with a mount for your desk and is easy to clean by simply twisting the base of the crank and dusting off the burr. Because we can't say it any better than Caran d'Ache, he's all you need to know about this special edition: "The adventure continues…In keeping with the collection issued in 2013 to celebrate the 80th anniversary of its famous sharpening machine, Caran d’Ache has unveiled a new exclusive edition of one of its most iconic products. Created in 1933, the famous Caran d’Ache sharpening machine has transcended the years and reinvented itself. Its high precision and durability have appealed to generations of pencil lovers. Featuring an exquisitely fashionable, iridescent colour, the sharpening machine has been issued in a limited edition of 4478, symbolising the altitude in metres of legendary Mount Matterhorn. Accompanied by its vintage metal box – it, too, picked out in a gentle shade of rosé – it is aimed at collectors and devotees of beautiful objects. Linking past with present, this new sharpening machine exudes the finely crafted refinement and elegance of Caran d’Ache products from yesteryear." Made in Switzerland Fits pencils 4mm to 10mm in diameter

sharpeners.title: Wood Cutter Pencil Sharpener - Kum
sharpeners.description: A reliable, standard point double hole sharpener that can sharpen pencils of any size. Instead of metal the sharpener's body is made of wood. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Sect Enclosed Pencil Sharpener
sharpeners.description: For versatile sharpening on the go, this sharpener has two holes (both for normal diameter pencils), one that does a long point and one that does a standard medium point. The best part is that the lid snaps shut for maximum tidiness. Made in Japan Two holes, one medium point, one long point

sharpeners.title: 4-in-1 Metallic Sharpener
sharpeners.description: This tidy little thing is truly a sharpener for all pencils (well, except carpenter pencils, but that's another story). There are two sides and four holes--each for a different diameter. The top side sharpens 8mm (slightly larger normal diameter) and 11mm (standard jumbo diameter) pencils and the bottom side sharpens 10mm (mini-jumbo) and 7mm (slightly smaller normal diameter) pencils. The best part is that there are hinged lids on both sides that snap shut to keep shavings and graphite dust out of your bag. Made in Germany Sharpens pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Die Cast Hand Crank Sharpener
sharpeners.description: There are a lot of hand crank sharpeners out there, but if you're looking for something versatile and long-lasting, we think this one is a great value. The body of the sharpener is metal and it features an extra large clear plastic reservoir for shavings. It's self-feeding and fits pencils of all diameters. On the head of the crank you'll find a small knob that adjusts the point sharpness in case you're using it with fragile pencils or colored pencils and want something more break-proof. Included is a clamp that fits into the back so you can affix it to a table. Made in Germany

sharpeners.title: Double Hole Parrot Pencil Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Add a little fun to your pencil box with this little guy. It's an enclosed double hole sharpener which works with any diameter of pencil. The lime green beak on the sharpener is actually an eraser that also functions to plug the holes of the sharpener to keep it from leaking graphite dust. Made in Germany

sharpeners.title: Grip 2001 Mini Pencil Sharpener
sharpeners.description: Made by German favorite, Faber-Castell, this plastic sharpener is compact and features a lid that snaps completely shut, making it an awesome travel sharpener. The whole top pulls off to empty and the single hole fits normal diameter pencils (except for a select few of the slightly chunky Caran d'Ache). Sharpens to a standard medium point. Made in China

sharpeners.title: Castor Brass Long Point Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Sister sharpener to the Pollux, the Castor in a single-blade long point sharpener. It's made out of solid brass and does a point comparable two-step long point sharpeners but with greater ease. Replacement blades are available for the Castor here. Made in Germany *Point comparison: Top - M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom - M+R Castor Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Pollux Brass Concave Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: As the rarest type of single-hole sharpener, this is one that we've been patiently anticipating the arrival of since early 2015 when it was first introduced. It's made of solid brass and has a blade that carves the pencil to a concave point that's longer than usual. It's convenient and elegant--a win-win in our book. For those on the hunt for a coveted antique A.W Faber Janus sharpener for its similarly concave capabilities, this is a comparable alternative. *Replacement blades for the Pollux are available here. Made in Germany Single-hole, can accommodate normal diameter pencils. *Though this sharpener sharpens beautifully, it only works perfectly on high-quality pencils with well-centered cores. We do not recommend using this sharpener as your everyday go-to as some pencils can't withstand the curve. Should your Pollux start breaking your pencils, that is usually a sign that it's time for new blades.

sharpeners.title: T'Gaal Adjustable Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: With five different length settings you can sharpener your pencil extra short--like the factory sharpened point on a golf pencil or to a proper long-point for extended writing sessions. Whatever length you prefer, you'll have all the options you'll ever need. Made in Japan

sharpeners.title: Masterpiece Long Point Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Behold: the longest point you'll ever get from a hand-held sharpener. Seriously, prepare to be amazed. The Kum Masterpiece is handmade from magnesium and has a two blade system with a removable brake situated on the end. It takes a bit of practice to get the hang of it. You use the blade on the left to sharpen the wood and the blade on the right for the graphite. You can read a very useful and detailed description of use here if you need a little help. Made in Germany Includes 2 replacement blades, a plastic case and a neoprene cover *Point Comparison - Top: Kum Magnesium Long Point Sharpener, Middle: Kum Automatic Long Point Sharpener, Bottom: Kum Masterpiece

sharpeners.title: Brass Bullet Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Every pencil collection needs this classic sharpener. It's heavy, comfortable to use and super sharp. We recommend it even for your most fragile pencils. The most important thing about effective sharpening is the blade sharpness, and though this is a hard-working sharpener the blades will need to be replaced over time. Made in Germany Single-hole, can accommodate normal diameter pencils. *Point comparison - Top: M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom: Dux Block Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Brass Bullet Sharpener with Key Ring 2
sharpeners.description: The Bullet Sharpener is our best-seller for its classic design and ability to sharpen any pencil to a reliable point. This version, however, is special because it has a key ring attached to it for all of your on-the-go sharpening needs (or if you just have a hard time keeping track of your sharpener). Made in Germany Single-hole, can accommodate normal diameter pencils *Point comparison - Top: M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom: Dux Block Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Brass Adjustable Sharpener with Leather Case 2
sharpeners.description: This sharpener is special because it harkens back to a time when it wasn't unusual to buy a pencil sharpener with an accompanying leather case. The sharpener itself is a version of the classic Dux brass block sharpener, except that it has a dial on the end which can be used to adjust the desired sharpness of the point. For precision tasks, you can get your pencil as sharp as can be but for more fragile pencils that are better off with a dull point (like colored pencils) there is no worry about over-sharpening. Made in Germany Measures 1" x 1/2" x 3/4" Includes one sharpener and one leather case along with instructions *Point comparison: From top to bottom, settings 1-3

sharpeners.title: Brass Block Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Sometimes simple is better, which usually tends to be the case when it comes to pencil sharpeners. This one is small but hard-working. It's made of solid brass and has a sharp, easy to replace blade. It sharpens to a medium point and with a sharp blade is gentle enough for even your most fragile pencils. Made in Germany Measures 1" x 1/2" x 3/4" *Point comparison - Top: M+R Bullet Sharpener, Bottom: Dux Block Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Brass Round Double-hole Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: A weighty, perfect sharpener for all sizes of pencils (Jumbo, Mini-Jumbo, Triangular, Heart-shaped--you name it!) by the classic German sharpener brand. It sharpens pencils of all shapes and sizes to a reliable medium point. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Brass Double-hole Wedge Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Made from solid brass and in the most recognizable pencil-sharpener shape, this double-hole wedge is an extra durable sharpener for every pencil in your arsenal. It sharpens to a medium point and if kept sharp can handle even your most fragile pencils. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Aluminum Double-hole Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Think of this as the luxury version of the sharpener you kept in your Spacemaker in elementary school. It's made of solid aluminum and has a double-hole sharpener affixed inside the lid. No matter what size the pencil, this sharpener can handle it. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" in height, 1 1/2" in diameter

sharpeners.title: Duroplast Double-hole Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: As one of the most nostalgic European sharpeners, this Bakelite classic has a single hole wedge sharpener affixed into the lid. The reservoir will catch all of your shavings and the sharpener blades are easily replaceable, making this a sharpener that's about much more than good looks. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" in height, 2" in diameter Double-hole. Can accommodate pencils of any size.

sharpeners.title: Duroplast Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: As one of the most nostalgic European sharpeners, this Bakelite classic has a single hole wedge sharpener affixed into the lid. The reservoir will catch all of your shavings and the sharpener blades are easily replaceable, making this a sharpener that's about much more than good looks. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/4" in height, 1 1/2" in diameter Single-hole

sharpeners.title: Lefty Double-hole Sharpener - 3 Colors 2
sharpeners.description: A sharpener just for our left-handed friends! This little guy twists the opposite way of a right-handed sharpener. A must have for the southpaws in your life. It catches the shavings too, so you don't have to worry about a mess. Made in Germany Double-hole for both normal and jumbo diameter pencils

sharpeners.title: Automatic Long Point Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Just in case a standard point isn't your jam, the blade on the left sharpens just the wood and the blade on the right does just the graphite, resulting in a point about 4mm longer than your average single blade. It might take a little bit of practice but once you get the hand of it you'll find that a long point is ideal for extensive writing and for achieving a very fine point. Made in Germany Measures 2 1/2" x 1" x 1 1/4" Includes two replacement blades *Point comparison - Top: Kum Magnesium Long Point Sharpener, Middle: Kum Automatic Long Point Sharpener, Bottom: Kum Masterpiece Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Magnesium Long Point Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: It's lightweight, affordable and simply very handy. This single-blade sharpener will give you a long point with out the fuss of a two-hole system. We consider this to be the starter sharpener for those looking to test out what this whole long-point thing is about. Made in Germany *Point comparison - Top: Kum Magnesium Long Point Sharpener, Middle: Kum Automatic Long Point Sharpener, Bottom: Kum Masterpiece Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Pencil Sharpening Machine 2
sharpeners.description: It doesn't really get any better than this sharpener. Built to last, this thing will sharpen even your most difficult pencils. The butterfly clamp can accommodate triangular, hexagonal, round, heart-shaped...basically any shape of pencil in any size. It comes with a mount for your desk and is easy to clean by simply twisting the base of the crank and dusting off the burr. Made in Switzerland

sharpeners.title: Uni Palette Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: We love this sharpener because it's simple and insanely compact. It's the perfect addition to your travel kit. Made in Japan *Point comparison: top - M+R Bullet Sharpener, bottom - Palette

sharpeners.title: Pencil Peeler 2
sharpeners.description: Alas--the perfect tool for the hand sharpening amateur! Or just the pencil enthusiast who's looking for a new way to get a great point. This is a modern version of a type of pencil peeling knife that was common in the 1800s. The sharp end of the blade faces inward so you can hold it from the curved end and drag it across the pencil tip to sharpener as you would with a regular knife, just with a bit more control*. Bonus: the Pencil Peeler was awarded Product of the Year for writing instruments by the International Stationery Press Association in 2017! Made in Switzerland of magnesium Measures 2 1/2" x 1" x 5/16" Comes with one peeler and three replacement blades *There are visual instructions on the back of the blister pack

sharpeners.title: Uni KH-20 Hand Crank Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Mitsubishi certainly knows good pencils and this sharpener is their perfect match. It's an easy-to-use self-feeding hand crank sharpener that sharpens to a remarkably long point. Made in China *Point comparison: top - KH-20, bottom - M+R Bullet Sharpener

sharpeners.title: Premium Rotary Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Designed in Germany for maximum sharpening efficiency, this simple, hardworking sharpening machine is a standard self-feeding hand-crank that can accommodate jumbo pencils too. On the back of the crank is a red dial to adjust sharpness and the a spot to insert a clamp in case you'd like to affix it to a table. Made in China Can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Double-hole Canister Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: We love this sharpener because it's simple and has a grown-up design with a pop of color (our favorite one, at that). It's the right size for a small desk or even for carrying in your bag as the lid snaps on pretty tight. Made in China Double-hole. Can accommodate pencils of any size.

sharpeners.title: Neon Plastic Double-Hole Wedge Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Simple, cute and perfect for your jumbo pencils. This sharpener uses standard tried-and-true Kum blades in a plastic sharpener body. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters.

sharpeners.title: 24-carat Gold Double Hole Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: The best of the best from the world's best known sharpener company! This beauty is 24-carat gold-plated and has a canister to collect the shavings in. It's a standard double-hole sharpener with replaceable blades. To top it off, it comes in a lovely box. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters.

sharpeners.title: Matterhorn Pencil Sharpening Machine -Brut Rosé Edition 2
sharpeners.description: It doesn't really get any better than this sharpener. Built to last, this thing will sharpen even your most difficult pencils. The butterfly clamp can accommodate triangular, hexagonal, round, heart-shaped...basically any shape of pencil in any size. It comes with a mount for your desk and is easy to clean by simply twisting the base of the crank and dusting off the burr. Because we can't say it any better than Caran d'Ache, he's all you need to know about this special edition: "The adventure continues…In keeping with the collection issued in 2013 to celebrate the 80th anniversary of its famous sharpening machine, Caran d’Ache has unveiled a new exclusive edition of one of its most iconic products. Created in 1933, the famous Caran d’Ache sharpening machine has transcended the years and reinvented itself. Its high precision and durability have appealed to generations of pencil lovers. Featuring an exquisitely fashionable, iridescent colour, the sharpening machine has been issued in a limited edition of 4478, symbolising the altitude in metres of legendary Mount Matterhorn. Accompanied by its vintage metal box – it, too, picked out in a gentle shade of rosé – it is aimed at collectors and devotees of beautiful objects. Linking past with present, this new sharpening machine exudes the finely crafted refinement and elegance of Caran d’Ache products from yesteryear." Made in Switzerland Fits pencils 4mm to 10mm in diameter

sharpeners.title: Wood Cutter Pencil Sharpener - Kum 2
sharpeners.description: A reliable, standard point double hole sharpener that can sharpen pencils of any size. Instead of metal the sharpener's body is made of wood. Made in Germany Double-hole, can accommodate pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Sect Enclosed Pencil Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: For versatile sharpening on the go, this sharpener has two holes (both for normal diameter pencils), one that does a long point and one that does a standard medium point. The best part is that the lid snaps shut for maximum tidiness. Made in Japan Two holes, one medium point, one long point

sharpeners.title: 4-in-1 Metallic Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: This tidy little thing is truly a sharpener for all pencils (well, except carpenter pencils, but that's another story). There are two sides and four holes--each for a different diameter. The top side sharpens 8mm (slightly larger normal diameter) and 11mm (standard jumbo diameter) pencils and the bottom side sharpens 10mm (mini-jumbo) and 7mm (slightly smaller normal diameter) pencils. The best part is that there are hinged lids on both sides that snap shut to keep shavings and graphite dust out of your bag. Made in Germany Sharpens pencils of all diameters

sharpeners.title: Die Cast Hand Crank Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: There are a lot of hand crank sharpeners out there, but if you're looking for something versatile and long-lasting, we think this one is a great value. The body of the sharpener is metal and it features an extra large clear plastic reservoir for shavings. It's self-feeding and fits pencils of all diameters. On the head of the crank you'll find a small knob that adjusts the point sharpness in case you're using it with fragile pencils or colored pencils and want something more break-proof. Included is a clamp that fits into the back so you can affix it to a table. Made in Germany

sharpeners.title: Double Hole Parrot Pencil Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Add a little fun to your pencil box with this little guy. It's an enclosed double hole sharpener which works with any diameter of pencil. The lime green beak on the sharpener is actually an eraser that also functions to plug the holes of the sharpener to keep it from leaking graphite dust. Made in Germany

sharpeners.title: Grip 2001 Mini Pencil Sharpener 2
sharpeners.description: Made by German favorite, Faber-Castell, this plastic sharpener is compact and features a lid that snaps completely shut, making it an awesome travel sharpener. The whole top pulls off to empty and the single hole fits normal diameter pencils (except for a select few of the slightly chunky Caran d'Ache). Sharpens to a standard medium point. Made in China

cases.title: CWPE Leather Pencil Case - Deep Red
cases.description: We're very excited about this pencil case. It's long enough to fit an unsharpened Blackwing, and can comfortably fit a dozen pencils, or half a dozen pencils and your favorite eraser and sharpener. It has our name on one side and the gorgeous Viking logo on the other, plus a super smooth zipper. Viking pencil company is a really special find--it was founded in 1914 by a matchstick company and after changing hands for a few decades have recently re-emerged. Made in the E.U. Measures 9 inches x 3 1/4 inches

cases.title: CWPE Leather Pencil Case - Black
cases.description: We're very excited about this pencil case. It's long enough to fit an unsharpened Blackwing, and can comfortably fit a dozen pencils, or half a dozen pencils and your favorite eraser and sharpener. It has our name on one side and the gorgeous Viking logo on the other, plus a super smooth zipper. Measures 9 inches x 3 1/4 inches

cases.title: CWPE Leather Pencil Case - Cognac
cases.description: We're very excited about this pencil case. Viking pencil company is a really special find--it was founded in 1914 by a matchstick company and after changing hands for a few decades have recently re-emerged. Made in the E.U. Measures 9 inches x 3 1/4 inches

cases.title: Cube Pencil Holder - 9 holes
cases.description: Made in Arizona by our pal Mike Dudek of Dudek Modern Goods from solid Walnut, these displays are the perfect way to store and show off your pencils. There are 9 holes cut to hold normal diameter pencils (with a little bit of wiggle room for the slightly chunky ones). An important detail is that at the bottom of each pencil hole is a tiny hole in which the point of the pencil stands so it stays perfectly upright. Now you'll just have to find pencils worthy of such a beautiful object.

cases.title: Pulp Storage Pencil Case - Grey
cases.description: Made from paper and super sturdy, this case will protect all of your precious pencil things. It snaps shut from the front and can hold about a dozen pencils, a small sharpener and an eraser. Made in Japan Measures 7 1/4" x 3 1/2" x 1" *Note that this pencil case is a tiny bit too short for brand-new pencils if they have an erasers on them. It's best for pencil that are well-loved or currently in use.

cases.title: Pulp Storage Pencil Case - Kraft
cases.description: Made from paper and super sturdy, this case will protect all of your precious pencil things. It snaps shut from the front and can hold about a dozen pencils, a small sharpener and an eraser. Made in Japan Measures 7 1/4" x 3 1/2" x 1" *Note that this pencil case is a tiny bit too short for brand-new pencils if they have an erasers on them. It's best for pencil that are well-loved or currently in use.

cases.title: Pulp Storage Pencil Case - Rust
cases.description: Made from paper and super sturdy, this case will protect all of your precious pencil things. It snaps shut from the front and can hold about a dozen pencils, a small sharpener and an eraser. Made in Japan Measures 7 1/4" x 3 1/2" x 1" *Note that this pencil case is a tiny bit too short for brand-new pencils if they have an erasers on them. It's best for pencil that are well-loved or currently in use.

cases.title: Solid Brass Pencil Case
cases.description: Give your pencils the home they deserve! This pencil case is made of solid brass and is designed to sit comfortably on any desk or surface. Over time,the brass develops a beautiful patina. The case does snap shut though we don't recommend using it to transport your pencils. Made in Japan Measures 6 1/2" x 1 7/8" x 7/8" * Note that this pencil case is 1/2-1" shorter than the average brand new pencil. It's terrific for well-loved or currently-in-use pencils but be aware that it won't fit unused ones.

cases.title: Shorthand Pencil Case
cases.description: A well-crafted, washable and long enough to fit even your freshest pencils, our friends over at Iron Curtain Press and Shorthand didn't spare a single detail when designing this pencil case! You'll be able to fit a dozen-ish pencils and all of your necessary accessories in this one. Made in the US Measures 8.5" x 2" x 1.75"

cases.title: Paper Cord Pencil Case
cases.description: Woven from study paper cord and just long enough to fit a new eraser-clad pencil, this case is big enough to hold about 3 pencils and an accessory or two and zips shut with a thick brass zipper. Made in Japan Measures 7 1/2" x 1 1/2" *Pencils not included

cases.title: Plastic Pencil Case - Green
cases.description: One of the many brands under the Japanese stationery powerhouse Hightide umbrella, this case is plastic so it's easy to wipe clean and also has two clear interior pockets and longer one across the length of the back. It snaps shut and is long enough to hold most new pencils (sorry Blackwings--you'll need a couple of sharpens first). Made in Taiwan Measures 8" x 3 1/2" with a 1/2" gusset

cases.title: Plastic Pencil Case - Red
cases.description: One of the many brands under the Japanese stationery powerhouse Hightide umbrella, this case is plastic so it's easy to wipe clean and also has two clear interior pockets and longer one across the length of the back. It snaps shut and is long enough to hold most new pencils (sorry Blackwings--you'll need a couple of sharpens first). Made in Taiwan Measures 8" x 3 1/2" with a 1/2" gusset

cases.title: Plastic Pencil Case - Yellow

It snaps shut and is long enough to hold most new pencils (sorry Blackwings--you'll need a couple of sharpens first). Made in Taiwan Measures 8" x 3 1/2" with a 1/2" gusset

cases.title: Barrel Pencil Case - Brown
cases.description: From our favorite new pencil accessories brand we bring you the perfect sturdy leather case for pencils off all sizes! This beauty is hand-stitched from thick, durable leather and can hold about a 10 pencils and a few small accessories. Made in the UK Measures 8 1/2" x 2" x 1 1/2"

cases.title: Pencil Portfolio
cases.description: Unlike any other pencil holder currently on the market, this British-made beauty is hand-stitched and made to hold your most prized pencils. Inside you'll find 5 pencil loops (for normal diameter pencils) and two small pockets for your sharpener and/or eraser. The whole thing folds together like an envelope and closes with two small brass buttons. Made in the UK Measures 5 1/2" x 9"

cases.title: Leather Envelope Pencil Case
cases.description: Stitch free, sturdy and made for for the minimalists EDC, this pencil case is made from thick leather and is secured and a brass button. It's handmade in the UK by High Meadows, one of our favorite pencil accessories brands. Made in the UK Measures 8" x 3 1/4"

cases.title: Mesh Pencil Case - Black
cases.description: It's hard to find a good, sturdy, long-enough-for-all-pencils, non-leather pencil case and we're thrilled to have come across this one. It's made of a tough mesh (be careful though, you might want to put caps on those pencils) and has a plastic zipper. Papier Tigre is a Paris-based stationery brand that was founded in 2011 and specializes in quality, super playful stationery wares for the desk that doesn't take itself too seriously. Made in France Measures 8 1/2" x 3 1/4"

cases.title: Mesh Pencil Case - Red
cases.description: It's hard to find a good, sturdy, long-enough-for-all-pencils, non-leather pencil case and we're thrilled to have come across this one. cases.title: The Charcoal Pencil Case - Blue
cases.description: Galen Leather is a Turkey-based maker of leather goods for stationery, including this, their newest model, which is made specifically to be long enough to fit Blackwing pencils. Its unique structure open from the end with a brass button and is hand-stitched from vegetable tanned cow leather with burnished edges. It'll fit about 6-8 of your favorite tools. Made in Turkey Measures 8.4" x 3" x .8"

cases.description: Galen Leather is a Turkey-based maker of leather goods for stationery, including this, their newest model, which is made specifically to be long enough to fit Blackwing pencils. This large model can be used for so many different things apart from just writing instruments with its flat bottom and YKK zipper. It's stitched from vegetable tanned cow leather with burnished edges. Made in Turkey Measures 9" x 3" x 2"

cases.title: XLarge Zipper Pencil Case - Green
cases.description: Galen Leather is a Turkey-based maker of leather goods for stationery, including this, their newest model, which is made specifically to be long enough to fit Blackwing pencils. cases.title: XLarge Zipper Pencil Case - Red

cases.title: Brass Pencil Cup

cases.description: Meet the most unique pencil case we've ever laid eyes on. This leather case is flat and zips down the middle so the back of the case can be folded back to create a stand for your stash. Made in Portugal from recycled leather off-cuts Fits 6-8 normal sized pencils

notebooks.title: Pencil Pushers Pocket Notebooks - 3-Pack
notebooks.description: This is a project we're been dreaming up for a while--our very own pocket notebooks! Our friends at Story Supply helped us design our perfect little notebook for pencil use, in which you'll find smooth, lined paper and a couple of surprises. On the front inside cover is a brief guide to the pencil grading scale and on the back inside cover is a chart for recording and rating the pencils you're using, you know, in case you want to take your pencil-using to the next level. Size: 3.5" x 5.5" 48 pages Made in the USA Includes 3 notebooks, one of each color

notebooks.title: A5 Notepad - Grid

Maybe the best part though, are the hand-sponged page edges. Made in Portugal Measures 6 1/2" x 9", the paper size is A5

notebooks.title: Jabara Accordion Letter Set - Green

Included are 10 lined envelopes and a pad of paper that is folded like an accordion and perforated so you get to choose how long your letter is, instead of the paper length telling you it's time to wrap it up. Made by 110 year old Haibara Paper Company for Craft Design Technology, this set is perfect for on-the-go correspondence, long love letters, or quick notes. It all fits into a compact cardboard holder so you won't have to worry about paper wrinkling. This particular set has faintly printed grid in light green and light green envelopes. Made in Japan Measures 8 1/4 x 3 1/2"

The Confidant is designed to open flat, making it perfect for journaling, drawing, note-taking or whatever else you have in mind for it. The linen-bound covers are durable and hold up well on the go, and the bright yellow bookmark is a lovely detail. The pages are nice and crisp and a perfect companion for pencils, but also take pen and water color well. Here it is: Aron's perfect composition notebook, which is basically the notebook of our adult-back-to-school dreams. It's masterfully constructed with a truly lay-flat binding, an ultra sturdy cover and heavy, smooth, bright white paper. To learn more about the inspiration and design of these book, click here. One the best parts, too, is that all these lovely pages are sandwiched between two pocket pages (you know, for stickers) and a super heavy, sturdy cover. notebooks.title: A5 Notepad - Grid 2

notebooks.title: Jabara Accordion Letter Set - Green 2
notebooks.description: This letter set is a little tricky to explain, mostly because it's like nothing we've ever seen before. Included are 10 lined envelopes and a pad of paper that is folded like an accordion and perforated so you get to choose how long your letter is, instead of the paper length telling you it's time to wrap it up. Made by 110 year old Haibara Paper Company for Craft Design Technology, this set is perfect for on-the-go correspondence, long love letters, or quick notes. It all fits into a compact cardboard holder so you won't have to worry about paper wrinkling. This particular set has faintly printed grid in light green and light green envelopes. Made in Japan Measures 8 1/4 x 3 1/2"

notebooks.title: Paper Journal - Electric Blue 2
notebooks.description: A modern take on an old-school exercise notebook, this glue-bound journal is great for any purpose and has a heavy, pearlescent electric blue cover. Made in Baltimore, Maryland Size: 5.5" by 8.5" 120 pages, 1/4" line ruling Cover: 70# paper stock

notebooks.title: Weekly Horizontal Planner (Undated) - Burgundy 2
notebooks.description: We're planner snobs around here and are picky practical page layouts and good design. This planner hits all the marks, with its 14 (undated) month layouts and horizontal weekly planning pages. In the front are a few pages for lists--films you've watch, books you've read and many more cute categories. One the best parts, too, is that all these lovely pages are sandwiched between two pocket pages (you know, for stickers) and a super heavy, sturdy cover. Made in Malaysia with 100gsm Italian Paper Measures 8" x 5.5" 160 pages

notebooks.title: Weekly Horizontal Planner (Undated) - Seafoam 2
notebooks.description: We're planner snobs around here and are picky practical page layouts and good design. This planner hits all the marks, with its 14 (undated) month layouts and horizontal weekly planning pages. In the front are a few pages for lists--films you've watch, books you've read and many more cute categories. One the best parts, too, is that all these lovely pages are sandwiched between two pocket pages (you know, for stickers) and a super heavy, sturdy cover. Made in Malaysia with 100gsm Italian Paper Measures 8" x 5.5" 160 pages

books.title: The Pencil Perfect by Caroline Weaver
books.description: The Pencil Perfect takes its namesake’s four simple ingredients – wood, graphite, clay, and water – and narrates a tale of worldwide influence and innovation. Caroline Weaver, pencil connoisseur and CW Pencil Enterprise Shop owner, composes texts that extol the nuanced influence of her beloved and humble implement. Illustrations exclusively drawn for The Pencil Perfect by Oriana Fenwick, an artist from Zimbabwe who works with fine details and intense realism, pair with Weaver’s words to present a story that is both endearing and enlightening. Through profiles of pencil makers, anecdotes about famous writers’ favorite pencils, and essays about the surprising role of pencils in world history and culture, the chronicle of a modest but mighty tool unfolds. Follow the charming contrivance as it guides the course of early communication in the Scientific Revolution, the American Revolutionary War, the Anglo-French War, and the French Revolution: it is a historical journey and a captivating memoir. See how its past contemporarily compares with its use and appearance today – from the Blackwing 602 to novelty ferrules. The development of cultures and communities is laid bare within the timeline of this slender entity. The Pencil Perfect immortalizes the biography of an inanimate object within its pages for a future cast of historians, writers, and curious minds. Hardcover 160 pages ISBN: 978-3-89955-675-9 Published by Gestalten, March 2017 *This description is taken from that of Gestalten because it's weird to write the description for your own book, right? Anyway, I think they did a great job.

books.title: How to Sharpen Pencils by David Rees
books.description: How to Sharpen Pencils is a hilarious little volume whose presence is essential on any curious persons bookcase. You'll laugh, you'll probably cut yourself trying to whittle down your nearest Ticonderoga but most importantly, you will indeed learn how to sharpen a pencil if that's what you're really in it for. Paperback 218 pages ISBN: 978-1-61219-326-7 Published by Melville House, New York

books.title: Pencils by Marco Ferreri
books.description: Pencils was first published in 1996 in conjunction with an exhibition by the same name. This was a project initiated by designer Carlo Giorgetti to "promote the minor arts" by way of collection. The book is full of impeccable images of pencils from all eras, from all corners of the world and honors the pencil as an object just as it should be. Measures 9 1/2 x 6 1/4 inches Paperback 112 pages ISBN: 88-86250-40-1 Published by Corraini Editore in Milan, Italy

books.title: Stationery Fever
books.description: A playful but thorough walk through the histories and present states of every important stationery item, this book will introduce you to stories you've never heard and places you've never been to (except for our shop, which you'll find on page 25!). For a full look through the book, check out Vetro Editions' website. Hardback 208 Pages ISBN: 9783791382722 Published by Prestel, November 2016

books.title: The Pencil by Allan Ahlberg & Bruce Ingman
books.description: Once there was a lonely pencil who drew a world around him and lived happily with his new human friends until an evil eraser showed up to ruin the party. Don't worry though, things end in the pencil's favor. You and your children are sure to fall in love with this funny and charming and well illustrated book. Paperback 48 pages ISBN: 978-0-7636-6088-8 Published by Candlewick Press, 2012

books.title: The Pencil: A History of Design and Circumstance by Henry Petroski
books.description: Originally published in 1990, you will probably find everything you ever wanted to know about pencils, their history, manufacture and craftsmanship in this whopper of a book. It's not a history textbook though, it's not at all stale and is likely to be very entertaining if you're of the pencil worshipping type. Paperback 434 pages ISBN: 0-679-73415-5 Published by Knopf, New York

books.title: The Secret Life of the Pencil by Alex Hammond & Mike Tinney
books.description: Since software programs have come to dominate offices and studios, the pencil has become a symbol for creative freedom. In other words, the work you do on the computer is what you do for work, to pay the rent, whereas the stuff you do with your pencil is the stuff you do for fun. Apart from stimulating the world's most important creative minds, the pencil has become the modern creative's ultimate fetish. This book presents a unique collection of close-up pictures of pencils from some of our foremost artists, designers, writers, architects, and musicians. What makes these pictures compelling is the fact that they somehow reflect the creative personalities of their owners: Philippe Starck's is a stylish black and red, Paul Smith's is a classic jewel-like thing worth £3,000 (a present from Jonathan Ive), William Boyd's is nicely aged and rusty, while Anish Kapoor's is sculpted into a mini ArcelorMittal Orbital tower. The pictures are complemented by materials such as sketches, quotes and brief interviews, giving a further insight into the workings of these great creative minds.Hardback 143 Pages ISBN: 9781786270832 Published by Laurence King Publishing

books.title: The Story of CalCedar - 100 Years of Pencil Supply History
books.description: Published to celebrate it's 100th anniversary in 2017, this beautiful volume covers the history of CalCedar (the world's foremost cedar slat manufacturer) and the Berolzheimer family's 160+ year history in the pencil industry. From their roots with Eagle Pencil Company to the Palomino Blackwing to the current state of the pencil industry, there's a lot to learn from Charles Berolzheimer of the family's 7th generation. Hardback Measures 11"x 9" x 1/2" 114 pages

books.title: Ultimate Draw Your Day Pack
books.description: Samantha is a Brooklyn based graphic designer and illustrator who has amassed a following on social media through her daily sketch journaling. She's been a friend of the shop since the very beginning and we're so thrilled about her new pair of books. This pack includes a selection of some of Samantha's favorite pencils, a copy of her book Draw Your Day and the companion sketchbook. Let Samantha guide you through learning the art of sketch journaling with easy to follow instructions and advice and just the right tools to get started. The pencil set includes one of each of the following pencils: Palomino Blackwing Pearl Pencil - While this pencil has been compared to a 2B, I find it closer to a 3B in smoothness and darkness. It's a gorgeous object with a rich history--and it's lovely to photograph. General's Kimberly Pencil in B - Green is my favorite color and one of my closest friends shares its name, so I liked it from the moment I saw it. Caran d'Ache Swiss Wood Pencil - It's the hardest pencil I use but I find it so lovely to draw with. It's subtly heavier, holds its point longer than most pencils, is a beautiful dark wood with a red end and even smells nice. Viarco Art Graf 2B Pencil - This pencil writes similarly to a 2B and is a bit like charcoal. Also, it's water-soluble, which allows you to give your drawings a wash of water for a painterly effect. Tombow Mono KM-KKS 6B Pencil - To round out the collection, I wanted to have a very soft, dark graphite pencil. The Mono is exceptionally buttery, smooth and excellent for drawing. Viking Verso 4B/HB Pencil - I discovered this pencil the day we chose the pack. It's double-ended, so you'll need pencil caps for this one. One end is soft and the other is firmer for writing. Sakura Sumo Mini Eraser - A hard-working, portable plastic eraser perfect for eliminating dark graphite messes.

refills.title: Blackwing Replacement Erasers (10 pack)
refills.description: Just in case you've changed your mind a lot, or you simply want to mix and match: Blackwing replacement erasers! They fit right into the clamp in your Blackwing's ferrule. These are made to fit any Blackwing pencil and can also be used for vintage Eberhard Faber pencils if you trim town the width a tiny bit. Sold in a pack of 10 Made in China

refills.title: Bullet Pencil Refill Set
refills.description: Bullet pencils were originally made from spent bullet cartridges and then later popularized as an advertising material during the first half of the 20th century. These are the refill pencils and erasers for a modern version, the Midori Bullet Pencil. Made in Japan Includes 3 pencils and 2 erasers

refills.title: Bullet Sharpener Replacement Blades
refills.description: Pack of 3 replacement blades for the Möbius & Ruppert Brass Bullet Sharpener and Brass Bullet Sharpener with key ring. Made in Germany Sold as pack of 3 sharpener blades

refills.title: Castell 9000 Perfect Pencil Refill - 3-pack
refills.description: The perfect length for your Perfect Pencil, these three pencils are about 2 inches shorter than the average length to accommodate the all-in-one cap of the Perfect Pencil or any pencil holder you may need a smaller pencil for. Made in Germany Grade: #1/B, runs hard, feels more like an HB or F. Measures 5 1/2" long Sold in a box of three Hexagonal barrel, normal Pre-sharpened

refills.title: GVFC Perfect Pencil Refill Set
refills.description: Made for the exquisite Graf von Faber Castell version of Faber-Castell's handy Perfect Pencil, these refills are a perfect fit (one of few, actually--they're made specifically for the Perfect Pencil and are a little bit bigger than normal pencil diameter). Made in Germany Includes 5 pencils

refills.title: Masterpiece Sharpener Replacement Blades
refills.description: Pack of 3 replacement blades for the Kum Masterpiece Sharpener. Made in Germany Sold as pack of 3 replacement blades

refills.title: Matomaru Kun Stick Eraser - Refill
refills.description: The Matomaru-Kun is one of Japan's most common erasers and for good reason. It's plastic, but not as firm as the ones you're probably used to. Its slight crumbly-ness makes it perfect for even delicate paper and prevents smearing. Made in Japan Made of PVC Contains two refill eraser sticks

refills.title: Mono Zero Eraser Refill
refills.description: The Mono eraser was first introduced by Tombow in 1969, taking its name from the company's prized Mono range of pencils. Tombow's erasers have a reputation for being some of the highest quality, hardest working plastic erasers on the market. This is a refill for the Mono Zero clip eraser and contains 2 eraser sticks. Made in Japan Each stick measures 1 1/2" x 2.3mm Made of plastic (PVC)

refills.title: Pencil Sharpening Machine Replacement Cutter
refills.description: Caran d'Ache Pencil Sharpening Machines are built to last a lifetime, and they certainly will, as long as you replace the cutter every year or so (depending on frequency of use). To replace, twist at the base of the handle and the cutter will pull out of the sharpener. From there you should be able to easily detach the old cutter and install the new one. Made in Switzerland

refills.title: Slendy Eraser Refills
refills.description: Super slim with a sturdy metal body, the Slendy Eraser is a perfectionist's new best friend. The tiny tip allows you to erase extra precisely and retracts neatly into the body when you're done. It's also remarkably slim, perfect for tucking in a pencil case or notebook. Muss and fuss gone. Made in Japan Measures 4 inches long Sold individually (replacement erasers sold as a pack of 2)

refills.title: Perfect Pencil Magnum Refill
refills.description: Made for the exquisite Graf von Faber Castell version of Faber-Castell's handy Perfect Pencil Magnum, these refills are a perfect fit (one of few, actually--they're made specifically for the Perfect Pencil Magnum, which is about mini-jumbo in diameter). Made in Germany Includes 3 pencils

refills.title: Pollux and Castor Replacement Blades
refills.description: For use with either of the Pollux or Castor sharpeners. Just use a tiny screwdriver (the the ones made for eyeglasses) to screw it onto your sharpener. Made in Germany Sold as pack of 3 sharpener blades

refills.title: Replacement Blades for Dux Sharpeners
refills.description: Three blades to keep your Dux sharpeners going. These fit in all Dux sharpeners and can be screwed in easily with a tiny screw driver. Made in Germany Sold as a pack of 3 sharpener blades

refills.title: Round Double-hole Sharpener Replacement Blades
refills.description: Pack of 3 replacement blades for the Möbius & Ruppert Brass Round Double-hole Sharpener. Made in Germany Sold as pack of 3 sharpener blades

refills.title: .9mm Replacement Leads
refills.description: These leads are made for Autopoint pencils but are also great for many types of antique mechanical pencils that take .9 or 1 mm lead. Hardness: available in HB, B, Blue and Red Diameter: .9mm Length: 1 3/8" Quantity: 12 leads

refills.title: Fixpencil 2mm Refill Lead - HB
refills.description: Technograph graphite refill leads for the Caran d'Ache Fixpencil. Made in Switzerland #2/HB Graphite Measures 4.5 inches long, 2mm diameter Sold as pack of 3

refills.title: Kuru Toga Pencil Leads - .5mm
refills.description: These high quality leads are made with a softer outer shell and a harder interior for optimum point-forming with your Kuru Toga pencil. They can be used with any pencil that takes .5mm lead but is ideal with Kuru Togas specifically. Hardness: Available in HB and B, both run a tiny bit soft Diameter: .5mm Length: 2 3/8" Quantity: 20 leads

refills.title: uni Nano Dia Mechanical Pencil Leads - .5mm
refills.description: For any mechanical pencil that takes .5mm leads, the Nano Dia are smooth, strong and a pencil world favorite. Hardness: available in F, HB and B, each hardness runs a tiny bit soft Diameter: .5mm Length: 2 3/8" Quantity: 40 leads

refills.title: Polymese .7mm Mechanical Pencil Lead - HB
refills.description: Smooth and strong, these .7mm leads are a great standard for general writing and sketching. Hardness: HB/#2, true to scale Diameter: .7mm Length: 2 1/2" Quantity: 12 leads

refills.title: Jumbo Autopoint Pencil Replacement Erasers
refills.description: These erasers are refills for the Autopoint All-American Jumbo Mechanical Pencil and are not recommended for any other type of pencil as they likely won't fit properly. Contains: 3 erasers in a cardboard tube

refills.title: Pentel Z2-1N Refill Eraser
refills.description: For the Pentel Smash pencil or any mechanical pencil that takes Pencil Z2-1N erasers. Contains 4 eraser

refills.title: Uni Replacement Eraser C (for Kuru Toga)
refills.description: These refill erasers are for Uni Kuru Toga mechanical pencils or any other Uni/Mitsub-bishi pencils that take size C erasers. Contains 5 erasers

refills.title: All-American Pencil Replacement Eraser
refills.description: These erasers are refills for the Autopoint All-American Mechanical Pencil and are not recommended for any other type of pencil as they likely won't fit properly. Contains: 3 erasers in a cardboard tube
