refills.description: These erasers are refills for the Autopoint All-American Mechanical Pencil and are not recommended for any other type of pencil as they likely won't fit properly. Contains: 3 erasers in a cardboard tube

accessories.title: Castell 9000 Perfect Pencil
accessories.description: Faber-Castell's flagship drawing pencil, the Castell 9000 has been worldwide staple since its launch in 1905. It's a very traditional, well-made German pencil, one that has set the standard for what a quality pencil should be. This set combines Faber-Castell's most famous pencil and their innovative Perfect Pencil--a pencil/clip/cap/sharpener combo. The pencil is protected by a sturdy cap that has a clip attached to it. If you un-screw the end of the cap you'll find a compact pencil sharpener. This set comes with 1 pencil. You can find the appropriately sized refills here. Most pencil will fit this cap, especially slightly shorter ones. Made in Germany

accessories.title: Peanpole Pencil Extender
accessories.description: Get the most out of your pencil with this extender. Just slip in your pencil stub and slide the metal ring to tighten it. With proper use, you'll be able to use your pencil until it's about 1/4" long. Made in Germany Made of beech wood Measures 4 7/8" long Hexagonal barrel

accessories.title: Metal Pencil Cap - 4 pack
accessories.description: Iconic, functional and easy on the eye--these Japanese metal caps can be stretched or pinched to fit any normal diameter pencil. For keeping your pencil case or bag clean and protecting the well-crafted point of your pencil these caps are ideal. Made in Japan Inclues 4 caps and 4 labels Fits any normal diameter pencil

accessories.title: Nickel-plated Pencil Cap
accessories.description: Pencil caps are something we're always in need of. This one is gorgeous, nickel-plated and will fit any normal diameter pencil. The slit on the side allows it to stretch in case you're using a pencil that is slightly larger (we're talking to you, Japanese pencils!). Made in Germany Sold individually

accessories.title: Blackwing Point Guard
accessories.description: For the most serious Blackwing user, a point protector that can withstand anything. This hefty little thing will keep your point from snapping, keep you bag, pencil case or pocket graphite-free and will give your beloved Blackwing a few extra points for style. Beware, though, this cap is made to fit Blackwings specifically and won't fit all pencils. Made in Taiwan Made of aluminum

accessories.title: Bullet Pencil Holder
accessories.description: Bullet pencils were originally made from spent bullet cartridges and then later popularized as an advertising material during the first half of the 20th century. The ones that are currently made are most certainly not made from cartridges anymore and this Midori version is a simple, beautiful tribute to the bullet pencils of yesteryear. The body of the pencil is lightweight, the pencil is cased in cedar and the eraser is replaceable and pleasantly soft. Though many normal diameter pencils will fit as a replacement when the included pencil gets short, you can find refills here. Made in Japan Measures 4 7/8" long Sold individually

accessories.title: Metal Pencil Cap - 6 pack
accessories.description: Iconic, functional and easy on the eye--these Japanese metal caps can be stretched or pinched to fit any normal diameter pencil. For keeping your pencil case or bag clean and protecting the well-crafted point of your pencil these caps are ideal. Made in Japan Inclues 4 caps and 4 labels Fits any normal diameter pencil

accessories.title: Smart Spot Pencil Attachment - Stylus
accessories.description: Leave it to e+m to come up with something like this--an attachment that hangs onto you pencil, has a stylus on the end and can be attached to your keys (or anything else). It has the same pencil holding fixture as a pencil extender--just slide the ring down, insert the pencil and then push the ring to tighten. It comes with a 3 1/4" long pencil to get your started, also. Made in Germany Measures 2" long (without pencil)

accessories.title: Classic Pencil Clip
accessories.description: Clip it to your notebook, your pocket, your pencil roll--whatever it may be, your pencil will be safe in this sturdy nickel pencil clip. They're made to fit any normal diameter pencil and can stretch a bit. Just slide it onto your pencil from the point end (it's easier if the pencil is already sharpened). Made in the USA Made of nickel Fits any normal diameter pencil

accessories.title: Platinum-plated Perfect Pencil
accessories.description: The Graf von Faber-Castell Perfect Pencil is the most luxurious and complete pencil experience. The fluted California cedar pencil comes with a capped eraser on one end, and a combination point-protector, pocket clip, and sharpener on the other. Both the pencil and the eraser can be replaced (keep in mind that the cap will only fit on Graf von Faber-Castell pencil refills). The high-quality graphite and platinum-plated hardware make this the Perfect tool for those who write, draw, or simply enjoy fine analog tools. Prior to the 20th century, the famous pencil firm went by the name A.W Faber until heiress Baroness Ottilie von Faber married Count Alexander zu Castell-Rüdenhausen. They legally changed their last names to Faber-Castell in order to use it as the new name for the family business. The Graf von Faber-Castell line (translated literally as the Count of Faber-Castell) celebrates the tradition and history of this esteemed company. Made in Germany Measures 6 inches assembled Pencil measures 5 1/4 inches Cap measures 3 inches Sold individually This set comes with 1 pencil. You can find the appropriately sized refills here. Please note that this only fits GvF pencils.

accessories.title: Faultless Pencil Clip - Nickel
accessories.description: Clip it to your notebook, your pocket, your pencil roll--whatever it may be, your pencil will be safe in this sturdy nickel pencil clip. They're made to fit any normal diameter pencil and can stretch a bit. Just slide it onto your pencil from the point end (it's easier if the pencil is already sharpened). Made in the USA Made of nickel Fits any normal diameter pencil

accessories.title: Kutsuwa Stad Highlighter Pencil - Yellow
accessories.description: For highlighting, bullet-journaling, list-making or whatever you might need a neon yellow pencil for, this bright little thing is extra special because it comes with a handy cap with a sharpener built in. Made in Taiwan Measures 7" long Sold individually Round barrel, normal diameter

accessories.title: Leather Sharpener Case
accessories.description: Here's a solution to a problem we hear about a lot--the danger/messiness of carrying an unenclosed sharpener loose in your bag. It's a handmade leather pencils sharpener holder that fits any single-hole sharpener (everything from M+R, Dux or Kum). It fastens shut with a brass button and will keep your sharpener safe in whatever you're carrying it around in. Made in the UK

accessories.title: Stetro Training Grip
accessories.description: Specially designed pencil grips for learning penmanship, in seven bright colors. Each dimple in the grip is meant for a specific pencil. It's made for use in either your right or left hand. Ergonomic and adorable! Made in USA Sold individually

accessories.title: Sattler Pencil Grip
accessories.description: We love these squishy little grips mostly for one reason: they fit JUMBO pencils! They're stretchy enough to fit onto any diameter of pencil and sticky enough to stay put. They're also indented to encourage a correct grip and can be used by righties and lefties alike.

accessories.title: Leather Pencil Cap
accessories.description: Made from supple leather and expertly constructed, this fancy little pencil cap actually holds TWO pencils. There's a slit on each side so your pencils fit snugly together but don't touch each other. Made in Japan Fits 2 normal diameter pencils
